post.description:
To use the provided temporary storage is a two step process.
    You start by declaring a media:// url that you can reference in any other API calls. The response will provide a url where you can put your media. This allows you to use the media:// url as a short-cut for a temporary storage location.
    You'll be returned a pre-signed url you can use to PUT and upload your media file. The temporary storage should allow you to read and write to the media:// locations for a period of at least 24 hours before it is removed.

You can download media you previously uploaded with /media/input or media that was generated through another API call.
The temporary storage should allow you to read and write to the media:// locations for a period of at least 24 hours before it is removed.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job ID to track the progress

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the jobs to return

url.description: The url should be in the form media://object-key where the object-key can be any alpha-numeric string. The object-key is unique to your account API token so there is no risk of collision with other users.

model.description:
Transcription model to use. Supported languages depend on the chosen model:
  - `parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v3`: Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maltese, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Russian or Ukrainian.
  - `faster-whisper-large-v3-turbo`: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Breton, Bulgarian, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Faroese, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, HaitianCreole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar, Nepali, Norwegian, Nynorsk, Occitan, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tibetan, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish or Yoruba.

url.description: URL of the audio file to be processed

webhook.description: Webhook URL to receive results when job is completed (optional)

webhookStatusOnly.description: When true, webhook payload only includes jobId and status (excludes output). Useful for large payloads.

numSpeakers.description: Number of speakers. Only use if the number of speakers is known in advance. Number of speakers is detected automatically if not provided. Setting this value results in better overall diarization performance. In rare cases where we cannot honor this request (e.g. short files and large number of speakers), a warning will be added to the output. Equivalent to sending minSpeakers==maxSpeakers

minSpeakers.description: Minimum number of speakers (must be <= maxSpeakers if both are set)

maxSpeakers.description: Maximum number of speakers (must be >= minSpeakers if both are set)

turnLevelConfidence.description: Includes turn-level confidence values in the output.

exclusive.description: Includes exclusive diarization values in the output in `exclusiveDiarization` key (equivalent to diarization but without overlapping speech).

confidence.description: Include confidence values in the output. Output is considerably larger when this option is enabled. Output includes a list of confidence scores with a resolution.

transcription.description: Enable speaker attributed transcription. Only available for the `precision-2` diarization model.

url.description: URL of the voiceprint audio file

webhook.description: Webhook URL to receive voiceprint results (optional)

webhookStatusOnly.description: When true, webhook payload only includes jobId and status (excludes output). Useful for large payloads.

exclusive.description: Prevent multiple speakers from being matched to the same voiceprint. Default to true

threshold.description: Prevent matching if confidence score is below this threshold. Value is between 0 and 100. Default is 0, meaning all voiceprints are matched

label.description: Label for the speaker. Labels can't start with "SPEAKER_"

url.description: URL of the audio file to be processed

webhook.description: Webhook URL to receive results when job is completed (optional)

webhookStatusOnly.description: When true, webhook payload only includes jobId and status (excludes output). Useful for large payloads.

numSpeakers.description: Number of speakers. Only use if the number of speakers is known in advance. Number of speakers is detected automatically if not provided. Setting this value results in better overall diarization performance. In rare cases where we cannot honor this request (e.g. short files and large number of speakers), a warning will be added to the output. Equivalent to sending minSpeakers==maxSpeakers

minSpeakers.description: Minimum number of speakers (must be <= maxSpeakers if both are set)

maxSpeakers.description: Maximum number of speakers (must be >= minSpeakers if both are set)

turnLevelConfidence.description: Includes turn-level confidence values in the output.

exclusive.description: Includes exclusive diarization values in the output in `exclusiveDiarization` key (equivalent to diarization but without overlapping speech).

confidence.description: Include confidence values in the output. Output is considerably larger when this option is enabled. Output includes a list of confidence scores with a resolution.

matching.description: Customize how voiceprints are matched against speakers

voiceprints.description: List of voiceprints to identify against

items.description: List of jobs. Sorted by creation date, descending. Does not include output data.

start.description: Start time of the segment in seconds

end.description: End time of the segment in seconds

confidence.description: Confidence scores that this speech turn matches each diarization speaker. Only available if `turnLevelConfidence` is set to true when job is created.

score.description: List of confidence scores for each sample. Values are between 0 and 100

resolution.description: Resolution of the confidence scores. Value is number of seconds per sample

start.description: Start time of the segment in seconds

end.description: End time of the segment in seconds

text.description: The transcribed speech content for this segment

confidence.description: Confidence scores details. Only returned if `confidence` is set to true when job is created

exclusiveDiarization.description: Exclusive diarization segments where only one speaker is active at a time. Only returned if `exclusive` is set to true when job is created.

wordLevelTranscription.description: Word-level transcription segments with text. Only returned if `transcription` is set to true when job is created.

turnLevelTranscription.description: Turn-level (speaker turn) transcription segments with text. Only returned if `transcription` is set to true when job is created.

jobId.description: Job ID to track the progress or get the results

createdAt.description: Date and time the job was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time the job was last updated

output.description: Output segments of a diarization, available for 24 hours after job completion

start.description: Start time of the segment in seconds

end.description: End time of the segment in seconds

confidence.description: Confidence scores that this speech turn matches each diarization speaker. Only available if `turnLevelConfidence` is set to true when job is created.

match.description: Label of the voiceprint that was identified following the matching settings
Label of the voiceprint that was identified following the matching settings

confidence.description: Confidence for each speaker label, as a dictionary of speaker label to confidence score
Confidence scores details. Only returned if `confidence` is set to true when job is created

exclusiveDiarization.description: Exclusive diarization segments where only one speaker is active at a time. Only returned if `exclusive` is set to true when job is created.

jobId.description: Job ID to track the progress or get the results

createdAt.description: Date and time the job was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time the job was last updated

output.description: Output segments of an identification job, available for 24 hours after job completion

voiceprint.description: Voiceprint of the audio. To be used for identification

jobId.description: Job ID to track the progress or get the results

createdAt.description: Date and time the job was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time the job was last updated

output.description: Output of a voiceprint job, available for 24 hours after job completion
